channel.title: Giovanni Tortorici on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Giovanni Tortorici on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Monica Bellucci to Star as Aristocratic Matron in Luca Guadagnino-Produced Film Directed by Giovanni Tortorici (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Monica Bellucci is set to play the matron of an aristocratic Sicilian family in Luca Guadagnino-produced drama “Ketticè,” directed by emerging Italian director Giovanni Tortorici. Cameras
